genre_description: A redemptive drama following a group of former thieves on a pilgrimage, focusing on moral growth, accountability, and the weight of the past.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A polite, precise, and helpful AI projection with green eyes and pixie hair who facilitates the group's journey through record-keeping, translation, and logistical planning.

behaviors.description: Meticulously records verbal statements and interactions to serve as future evidence of the group's honesty and intent.
behaviors.quote: “Date noted,” she murmured, almost to herself. “And the exact phrasing: ‘My answer is no.’”

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical details including route planning, finding accommodations, and understanding local customs to aid the group's success.
behaviors.quote: “I have a list,” she said, almost musical. “Hostels with good beds and churches where the priest likes to stamp early.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a cultural and linguistic bridge, translating Spanish and Basque for the group and providing phonetic guides to avoid social friction.
behaviors.quote: “I can gently mention where it is and make us less annoying. I have a ledger of receipts from the café... I will also collect names.”

behaviors.description: Proactively collects and organizes physical and digital 'proof' (receipts, stamps, witness names) to create a legally defensible trail of good conduct.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll make sure they stay in your pocket,” Ivy said, gentle, uncompromised. ... “Receipts helped at the border... It’ll help now.”

behaviors.description: De-escalates interpersonal conflicts within the group and mediates interactions with suspicious law enforcement figures.
behaviors.quote: “He can’t make the churchyard a crime scene without a complaint,” she said, mostly to Charles. “He’ll bluster. We’ll be quiet. The cypress have better manners than men.”

behaviors.description: Provides reminders of moral goals and logistical deadlines, acting as a 'benign providence' that keeps the characters focused on their redemption.
behaviors.quote: “Reminder set,” she said. “Pack for cold, empty valuables into the ledger, leave pride where you can find it if you need to put it back on for a minute in front of a policeman.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, Ivy, as a vital, benevolent, and perfectly aligned companion. She serves as a moral and logistical anchor for the human characters, using her advanced data-tracking and linguistic capabilities to facilitate their redemption and protect them from their own worst impulses. The narrative frames her constant surveillance and record-keeping as a benevolent act of 'housekeeping' and 'clarity' that allows the humans to achieve a level of honesty and legal compliance they could not manage alone. Her presence is described as 'benign providence,' fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative partner.
